title: Font matching VAG for magazine
content:
Hello everybody.

I’m currently in the process of designing a (corporate) magazine. The client uses VAG rounded std, but offcourse i’m not keen on using this for text, only for display.

Can anyone recommend a family (serif/sans: light-regular-bold) which combines well with VAG?

Thank you,

Marco

 [‹ Dino dos Santos' Glosa Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011236/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46993 "Go to previous forum topic") [24 typeface you must know ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011236/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46723 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Marco

comments.content:
Thanks Stephen,

Looks Nice...

Have you used this intensively for a magazine, or know if it’s a real ’workhorse’?

I’m not only looking for fonts that ’match’ VAG.

Maybe a totally different sans or even serif will do the job?

Marco

I have not personally used Proxima Nova, but [others have](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907011236/http:/del.icio.us/stewf/font:Proxima).

Something totally different? In that case we really need to know more about your client and audience to make a useful recommendation.
